grounds-for-application: The installation of discrete accessibility features including a platform lift and accessible WC facilities represents the minimum intervention necessary to comply with Equality Act 2010 requirements while preserving the Grade II listed building's special character. The proposed platform lift utilizes an existing service stairwell and requires no structural alterations to historic fabric. The accessible facilities are located within a modern extension added in the 1990s which is not part of the listed designation. All alterations are fully reversible and designed to have minimal visual impact on the building's character and appearance.
